short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an ultimate productivity extension that connects to your jobdesk® enterprise app and helps you grow & maintain your contacts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
jobdesk® - Contact 


This is an ultimate productivity extension that connects to your jobdesk® enterprise app and helps you grow and maintain your contacts while you are browsing. 
Based on where you are (LinkedIn, Xing or other websites), it offers you valuable information about companies, people and jobs. It offers you features to import publicly accessible data, update existing contacts, initiate a direct contact, send WhatsApp messages and much more.
To benefit from this extension, you need to be a jobdesk® enterprise user. 
jobdesk® is the most modern Swiss technology solution for recruiting and temping agencies of all sizes, and a growing leader in its field. 
jobdesk® enterprise is an enterprise-grade solution that covers all recruiting agency business needs.
